text:
This one would really be a very small improvement, that would help alot when building horizontal layouts that require a scroll…

It’s a real blocker.

Happy to help, Erik. Can you help me understand more here? I'd like to see your table if possible to get clarity on the blocker here and brainstorm ways to unblock you. Feel free to send it here, or I'm happy to have a <https://HubSpot.com/meetings/aanchal-sheth/11-meeting-link|quick chat> if its easier to explain that way.

Hello team!:wave:
We're running a quick *alpha for a new Charts component* (<https://app.HubSpot.com/l/product-updates/new-to-you?query=chart&update=13946310|details here>) :chart_with_upwards_trend: and need ~5-6 developers who are willing to test this out and give feedback within 1-2 weeks. This is a component that helps visualize external data in the form of a line or bar chart. Please reply in this thread if you're interested:thread:

Thank you :slightly_smiling_face:
